reviewText: This movie is a thoroughly original, endearing, and wonderful modernization of MacBeth, but without the unpleasantness.  Whether or not you love Shakespeare, you're sure to love this!

Okay, it's low budget, but you got to love a film that has heart, humor, poetry, charm, pot brownies and a stuffed skunk. The acting, writing and location are superb. If you watch this film with someone you love, you'll probably end up marrying him or her. It's that magical.
